attributes.action: Move Easter & May Bank Holidays in 2020. Move them to 3 & 6 July, 3 & 28 August.
attributes.additional_details: Quite simply the country can not appreciate bank holidays this year. We should reward people for respecting advice and staying inside in April and May. When self isolating is over, reschedule the holidays to help us all remember what socialising was!
attributes.background: Given the period of self isolation, help the county come back together by giving us our long weekend back and a great August!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
